I'm a 2nd-year PhD Student in Cognitive and Computational Neuroscience at LPNC, CNRS UMR 5105, UGA, Grenoble, France. My [research project](https://lpnc.univ-grenoble-alpes.fr/recherche/production-scientifique/projets-en-cours/lumintermod) is about modeling how our brain reorganizes across the lifespan to preserve optimal cognitive (language) performances.
